    • Method Detail

      • compile

        public Compiler compile(Node node)
        Description copied from interface: Compiler
        Starts a brand new compilation. This should ONLY be called by the main PebbleEngine. It should not be used by any TokenParsers, instead use subcompile(Node node).
        Specified by:
        compile in interface Compiler
        Parameters:
        node - Root node to start the compilation process.
        Returns:
        this

      • subcompile

        public Compiler subcompile(Node node)
        Description copied from interface: Compiler
        Compiles an individual node. It is the responsibility of the node to compile any children nodes it might have. This method will add indentation to the compiled output.
        Specified by:
        subcompile in interface Compiler
        Parameters:
        node - Node to be compiled
        Returns:
        this

      • subcompile

        public Compiler subcompile(Node node,
                  boolean raw)
        Description copied from interface: Compiler
        Compiles an individual node. It is the responsibility of the node to compile any children nodes it might have.
        Specified by:
        subcompile in interface Compiler
        Parameters:
        node - Node to be compiled
        raw - If false, compiler will add indentation.
        Returns:
        this

        public Compiler write(String string)
        Description copied from interface: Compiler
        Will write a line of code with indentation added to the beginning.
        Specified by:

        Parameters:

        public Compiler raw(String string)
        Description copied from interface: Compiler

      • string

        public Compiler string(String string)
        Description copied from interface: Compiler
        This method will escape all necessary characters within the input text, surround the input text with double quotation marks and then write the final Java-safe String to the compilation output.
        Specified by:
        string in interface Compiler
        Parameters:
        string - Text which will be converted to a proper Java string.
        Returns:
        this

      • indent

        public Compiler indent()
        Description copied from interface: Compiler
        Increase the indentation level by one. The indentation level will stay increased until the outdent() method is called.
        Specified by:
        indent in interface Compiler
        Returns:
        this

      • instantiateTemplate

        public PebbleTemplateImpl instantiateTemplate(String javaSource,
                                     String className,
                                     PebbleTemplateImpl parent)
                                       throws CompilationException
        Description copied from interface: Compiler
        This method should only called from the main PebbleEngine class. While the rest of the compiler converts Nodes into a StringBuilder, this method will convert that StringBuilder into an actual Java class instance.
        Specified by:
        instantiateTemplate in interface Compiler
        Parameters:
        javaSource - Java source code
        className - The name of the generated class name
        Returns:
        The final PebbleTemplate instance
        Throws:
        CompilationException
